user_query: I'm a journalist working on an article about the history of New York. Retrieve the articles from the NY Times archive in October 1999. Additionally, fetch the details of the project with the ID 29163f4f-7c8f-4baf-adf3-753c1df429c2 and list the jobs associated with it.

TaskList.description: Retrieve articles from the NY Times archive for October 1999.
Fetch details of the project with the specified ID.
List jobs associated with the project retrieved in step 2.
